Reasoning: **Okay, here's the game plan, meticulously crafted and executed. We're in a bit of a tight spot – that -1 hand size from the Boss is making things interesting, but I relish a challenge.**

First, I need to hit 4000 chips in just three hands. I'm starting with 1075, so a hefty 2925 more are needed. My jokers are Ride the Bus, Acrobat (which is the x3 multiplier on the final hand), Midas Mask (which, thankfully, isn't active right now), and Greedy Joker (that sweet +3 Mult for Diamonds).

Let's look at the hand dealt: Jack(S), Queen(C), 8(C), 6(C), 9(D), 8(D), 2(D). The 9 of Diamonds gives Greedy Joker and has a +9 chip. My Ride the Bus Joker is also a big mult.

I need to focus on High Card plays (Level 4), since the other hand levels are too low. I *must* avoid face cards to keep that Ride the Bus multiplier growing.

*   **Hand 3 (Now):** The 9 of Diamonds is my ace. I can get 1232 chips. Play 5, 4, 7, and 3 for a High Card of 1232 chips. That leaves me with a Jack, Queen, and 8(D). This gives me 2307 total.

*   **Hand 2:** For this hand, I'll aim for about 1200 chips. It's safe to make this hand a little lower since it is not the final hand.
*   **Hand 1 (Final):** Acrobat x3 multiplier is the grand finale. I can easily surpass the target here. High Card with multiplier, and the Greedy Joker should get me safely to 3600 chips, if not higher. That will get me to about 7100 total. This will easily clear the bar.

I have 9 of Diamonds, the 6 of Clubs, the 2 of Diamonds, and the 8 of Clubs. That's a strong start. It all goes back to keeping "Ride the Bus" climbing. With some well-timed plays and a little luck, this blind will be conquered.

The "Acrobat" Joker, X3 the final hand, is crucial, so this hand is Hand 2, and the *next* hand is the last. I also have "Midas Mask," which makes Face Cards gold when scored. I *don't* want to score any Face Cards right now, so that's irrelevant. "Greedy Joker" is great – it adds +3 Multiplier to Diamond cards that are *scored*.

My goal is clear: Score a decent chunk of points *without* resetting "Ride the Bus", and set up a killer final hand for the Acrobat. I need to leave myself with a score of 402 or less for the final hand.

I've double checked that the Diamonds other than the High Card, (6D, 4D), won't be counted for "Greedy Joker".

This will leave me needing 402 chips to win, which I can absolutely achieve with the final Acrobat hand. Playing the High Card strategy this hand gives me a safe path to victory.

# Available Commands
The possible commands in Balatro are all composed of a single word specifying the action, followed by any necessary positional arguments, which are lists of integers.
Note: all position arguments are 1-indexed.

The following commands are available in your current game state.
use_consumable <consumeable_position> <target_card_position1> <target_card_position2> ... <target_card_positionN> - Use a consumeable from the consumeables section. The first position argument is the position within your consumables inventory of the consumable you'd like to use. Subsequent position arguments specify the cards in hand that the consumeable will be used on, if that consumeable requires targets.
sell_consumable <consumeable_position> - Sell a consumeable from the consumeables section.
rearrange_jokers <joker1> <joker2> ... <jokerN> - Rearrange the list of currently owned jokers. Every index in the list of current jokers must be present, i.e. if there are 5 jokers, the indices 1-5 must be present.
sell_joker <joker_position> - Sell a joker from the jokers section.
buy_card <card_position> - Buy a card from the card section. Individual Joker cards are also bought from the card section.
buy_booster <booster_pack_position> - Buy a booster pack from the booster pack section.
buy_voucher <voucher_position> - Buy a voucher from the voucher section.
buy_and_use_consumable <consumable_position> - Buy a consumable type card (Tarot, Planet, Spectral) from the card section and use it immediately. Cannot do this if the consumable requires target hand cards.
round_select - Finish shopping and go to the round select screen.
reroll_shop - Spends the reroll cost to reroll the cards section of the shop.
